entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
